Posts.EditableText: You have it inside the Player object.
Posts.HTML: You have it inside the Player object.

Posts.EditableText: Did you solve this?  I have the same issue.  I can put something in a character, but you can't search it.  I'm stuck on this.  I want to be able to search for an item in a pocket.
Posts.HTML: Did you solve this? I have the same issue. I can put something in a character, but you can't search it. I'm stuck on this. I want to be able to search for an item in a pocket.

Posts.EditableText:
You type "search pocket."
1. Either you turn the item into a conatainer,
or,
2. you move the object. The code  is:
```
MoveObject (object, player)
```
Posts.HTML:
You type "search pocket."

  1. Either you turn the item into a conatainer,
    or,
  2. you move the object. The code is:
MoveObject (object, player)
